item.title: Counterstrike
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:31, topic:170185”]Can someone tell me how to get this? (Either 1.6 or CS:S)

Like do you have to pay to play? Or can i just torrent? And do i need a steam account for it?[/quote]
To play online(which is what everybody does, playing offline is just boring) you will need a steam account.

You get a steam account free, you have to download steam from the steam website.

Then you buy the game on steam [you will understand how when you download steam]. Then it downloads it all through steam and its ready to play when its done downloading.

I am not aware of any cracks, you can play online but only a non secure server [and those are usually really boring and full of cheaters]

Read full topic
